cast.overview: Before Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr took the names Professor X and Magneto, they were two young men discovering their powers for the first time. Before they were arch-enemies, they were closest of friends, working together with other mutants (some familiar, some new), to stop the greatest threat the world has ever known.
cast.title: X-Men: First Class

cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
cast.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

cast.original_title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
cast.overview: Follows three social outcasts -- two geeks and a cynic -- as they attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum in the middle of a British pub.
cast.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel

cast.overview: The US President and the UK Prime Minister are planning on launching a war in the Middle East, but—behind the scenes—government officials and advisers are either promoting the war or are trying to prevent it.
cast.title: In the Loop

cast.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.
cast.title: The Dark Knight

cast.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.
cast.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

details.biography: John Snowden is an Actor. He started out as a supporting artist in 2005 which led into mainstream acting, and has had many roles within TV and film, The Bill, Whitechapel, Outnumbered, EastEnders, Holby, Harry Hill, The One show as head of the BBC ( some live TV ), documentaries such as Bedlam, and The Brighton Bombing and many commercials. He has also appeared playing the King of England for the Royal Shakespeare Company in Hamlet.
details.name: John Snowden
